author: weaver
msg: The beginnings of the contnet server.  The servlet is basically nothing right now.
However, the automated deployment system is 85% complete and is generic enough to
be used with other types of deployment besides themes content.  For example
it will be very easy to write a DeploymentEventListener that wraps the PAM
for automating portlet application deployment.
The javadocs also need to be fleshed out.

author: taylor
msg: First working implementation of Capability for J2
Capability valve enabled to call Capability service.

author: taylor
msg: Profiler

msg: Patch from Roger Ruttimann to fix the PAM deploy bug with not finding the DTD on the web.
